content:
President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky announced for 2024 the maximum increase in Ukrainian defense production.

The head of statereportedDuring the evening appeal to the people of Ukraine.

“This year we must go out and go to the maximum Ukrainian defense production for all independence. And every year we will always add this potential of our potential - the obvious strategic perspective of Ukraine, ”the President said.

Volodymyr Zelensky thanked everyone who "works for this, giving all their own strength, and to anyone who really helps - every leader, every state, every company of the world with Ukraine."

Also the head of statereportedabout holding a rate at which the head of the head heard on the main directions of action.

“Analysis of ammunition dynamics - logistics in the army has become more effective. There were reports of the Ministry of Defense and the Ministry of Defense on contracts for the supply of weapons and shells from both partner countries and from its own production, ”he added.

As reportedArmyinform, Volodymyr Zelenskyy noted the battle units that best proved to be on the battlefield.
title: This year we will go to the maximum Ukrainian defense production for the whole time - the President
